# shared()

**Type Method**

Returns a singleton DNS proxy manager instance.

## Declaration

```swift
class func shared() -> NEDNSProxyManager
```

## Return Value

The [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEDNSProxyManager] instance for the app.

## Discussion

Each app is allowed to create a single DNS proxy manager. The [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEDNSProxyManager/shared()] type method returns a singleton [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEDNSProxyManager] instance that your app can use to manage any DNS proxy instances that it creates.

## Managing the DNS proxy configuration

- **loadFromPreferences(completionHandler:)**: Loads the current DNS proxy configuration from the caller’s DNS proxy preferences.
- **saveToPreferences(completionHandler:)**: Saves the DNS proxy configuration in the caller’s DNS proxy preferences.
- **removeFromPreferences(completionHandler:)**: Removes the DNS proxy configuration from the caller’s DNS proxy preferences.
